tool_description: Analyzes applicant flow patterns and conversion rates to provide insights on posting effectiveness and candidate quality.

application_data.description: Raw application data entries for analysis

analysis_timeframe.description: Analysis timeframe: week, month, or quarter

error_messages: Insufficient application data: Minimum 5 application entries required for meaningful analysis
Invalid analysis timeframe: Use one of [week, month, quarter]
Data format error: Application data must be in the correct format for processing
Incomplete data: Some required fields are missing from the application data
usage: Provide application data entries and specify analysis timeframe. The tool analyzes applicant patterns, conversion rates, and provides insights on posting and recruitment effectiveness.

conversion_rate.description: Overall conversion rate from application to next stage

source_effectiveness.description: Effectiveness ranking of different application sources

time_to_apply.description: Average time from posting view to application submission in hours

insights.description: Key insights and recommendations based on the analysis
